description:
Do you think you are good at adding numbers fast? Let’s see! Test your skills in this addictive puzzle game! Add-O-Matic is all about adding numbers. The game rules are easy to learn, but hard to master! Out-run the timer and prove that you are a numbers master!

FEATURES:
- 3 levels of difficulty: Easy, Normal and Insane!
- Training mode – good for kids to learn number addition!
- Available on your favorite device!

♥ WHAT PEOPLE SAY:
“…Helped me to engage my kid into learning how to add numbers!” – Lara M.
“…Quite addicting!..” – Josh B.

OTHER FUN GAMES FROM US:
♥ Vampires Vs Werewolves - turn-based strategy game;
♥ Pigs Can Fly - funny arcade game


♥ FOLLOW US:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/GameAmour
